sendOrRequestDescription: Kisi anya user ko seedhe paise bhejiye ya unse paise maangiye. Neeche apna vikalp chuniye.
recipientMustHaveAccount: Praptakarta ke paas system mein ek account hona chahiye
chooseAccount: Kaunsa account se paise bhejna hai, chuniye
amountRequesting: Woh rashi jo aap praptakarta se maang rahe hain
amountDeducted: Rashi aapke account se ghata di jayegi
notesPlaceholder: Praptakarta ke liye ek sandesh likhiye
successRequest: Paise ki request safaltapoorvak bheji gayi! Praptakarta ko suchit kiya jaayega aur ve usse approve ya reject kar sakte hain.
successSend: Paise safaltapoorvak bheje gaye! Transfer poori tarah se ho gaya hai.
errorNetwork: Network error. Kripya dobara koshish kijiye.
errorSubmit: Reimbursement request bhejne mein asafalta hui
